Лучшая игра из серии Биошок ! Поклонникам обязательно к прохождению ! Снова та же куча оружия,та же возможность апгрейдить его до бесконечности, ахринительный сюжет + неожиданные повороты в нём и развязка+ катания на воздушных магистралях на бешеных скоростях. О да, Детка ! Это Биошок !
Awesome story and graphics, 10/10
Игра, определенно, стоит своих денег. Удивительно красивый мир. Невероятно захватывающий сюжет, полный неожиданных поворотов. От этой игры вы получите очень много удовольствия. Всем рекомендую

отличная  игра  .
Una obra maestra.
Jodidamente perfecto y con un apartado grafico excelente y una jugabilidad no tan mala como las críticas explican. Es un perfecto final de la saga 10/10.

Giocon con una trama e aun'ambientazione fantastica. Columbia sa rapirti lasciandoti per lunghissimi momenti a rimirare la prticolarità e la bellezza di questa città, che fa da sfondo a una trama inizialmente lenta ma che pian piano accelerà fino al colpo di scena finaleche di colpo mette assieme tutti i pezzi del puzzle. Un gioco da godere con calma, esplorando ogni angolo, leggendo ogni scritta, ascoltando ogni dialogo e cercando tutti i voxofoni.
Unica pecca è forse il gameplay, troppo semplice e senza spunti originali come magari era nei primi due Bioshok. L'azione anche è limitata a brevi momenti, ma nel complesso non l'ho sentito come problema, grazie appunto alla storia e all'almbientazione che da sole reggono benissimo tutto.
A brilliant game! Fast paced, fun going, action pack!
Very fun to play, the powers are awesome and lead to some hilarious encounters with enemies. I thoroughly recommend this game to anyone new to shooters or pc gaming.
improvement in every way

After playing Bioshock 1 and 2, this game certainly did NOT disappoint!  Of course I was, at this point, looking for that plot twist and boy does it hit you hard.  DAMN YOU ELIZABETH Y U DO DIS TO ME?

Bioshock Infinite is quite possibly the best game I have ever played.  Nothing has made me feel this way, since System Shock 2, which is the only other game I've ever played in which the mood, theme and atmosphere was beyond on point. 10/10.  Mind Alteringly good.

This is a excellent game,  Graphics are great, storyline good, tying the story to the 1st and second  BS series. Great price when on sale.   U cannot go wrong if u like FPS,  GREAT GAME . I rate it in the Top 10 games  i have play.
HAVE YOU EVER CRIED OVER A GAME?!?!?! YOU WILL! I CAN'T RECOMMEND THIS GAME HARD ENOUGH
One of the best games I have ever played. The twists and turns of the story got the best of me, especially in the ending. This is a MUST BUY for all RPG / storydriven fans.

Worth the Purchase?  Hell Yeah.

Storyline there?  Hell Yeah, odd but most certainly enjoyable!

Graphics?  Some of the most beautiful I have ever seen.

Longevity?  Well I notice a trend with games of late, they only seem to have a single run through game life.  Dead Space 2 is a great example of a recentish game that I just wanted to play over and over to keep unlocking the suits and other goodies.  Bioshock Infinite, while enjoyable every step of the way, didn't make me want to start all over again.

This game is great if you've played the first two definitely pick it up it took everything great from the first two games and made one new kickass game!

1 Great Plot

3 good combat system
ótimo jogo!

[h1] One word for each aspect of this game.	[/h1]

Story - Extravagant.
Characters - Spectacular.
Gameplay - Enjoyable.
Immersion - Awesome.
Environment - Phenomenal.
Graphics - Good.
Sound - Good.
Music - Elegant.

Overall - Fantastic.

Jamas en la vida he hecho  un analisis de algun juego, pero BioShock Infinite lo merece. Al igual que muchos otros comentan, despues de acabar el juego te deja con un vacio existencial que te púede durar semanas, incluso hasta me da miedo jugar los DLC.
La calidad de los graficos, el modo de juego y por sobretodo la HISTORIA  te deja con la sensacion de que estas frente  a  una verdadera OBRA MAESTRA. Esta por demas decir que Elizabeth que te acompañara en tus peripecias  a lo largo, ancho y alto de Columbia es el personaje secundario mas hermoso que hayan podido crear, tanto que te enamora el cuidado que han tenido para crearla.
En resumen 10/10 y ahora mismo me comprare los DLC y a terminar de sacarme la espina

10/10 story ---- you cant even imagin what kind of ending it has , you cant guess 
8/10 gameplay ---- not good as HL2 , still better than cod

an enjoyable game, lots of fun

BioShock Infinite is a brilliant shooter that nudges the entire genre forward with innovations in both storytelling and gameplay. It trips over itself in a couple of spots, but not in any way that should keep you from embracing it with your utmost enthusiasm. When you will see Columbia for the first time, you will remember it for a long time.
I open a door and get sniped. Soon after elizabeth revives me. 10/10
Stil havent finished it but its wonderfull... Anyone who sais its not like bioshock 2 is wrong this game is awesome... it blows my mind :D i wanna play the expansions aswell :D

An excellent addition to the Bioshock Franchise, Infinite acts as a semi-prequel, semi-standalone title for its two predecessors. Set on the floating city of Columbia, Infinite presents a refreshing change from the dark and sinister setting of the sea-floor Rapture, while still staying true at its core to the franchise's overall gameplay. 

There's much in the game for hardcore Bioshock fans and new players alike, and the very similar overall controls of the game make for an extremely enjoyable marathoning session. 

The world represented in Infinite is stunningly beautiful, and I would suggest it even to casual gamers for playing on easy mode just to enjoy the idyllic scenery and captivating story. 

10/10 would definitely recommend.
This game is so much fun, but keep it mind it will mess with your mind.
FAVOURITE GAME OF ALL TIME
-Besides from the mindblowing plot that drives you crazy, it is a game that makes you wonder about the everyday life. It is also one of the best optimised games i have ever played!!!

MAGICAL. BEAUTIFUL. Blew my mind, just get it. Really good gameplay dynamics with an incredible story to bring you along. I only play games for the story and this game provided, but also made me love playing first-person shooters because it was done so well. It was just cool.
Unforgetable experience! Must play!
Overrated crap, don't buy or cry. Shut up.
yes

The storyline was tedious and cliched. The whole city in the sky concept turned out to be very underwhelming. The under the sea scenario of the first Bioshock was a hell of a lot more captivating\atmospheric\exciting. The DLCs offer little content for a lot of cash monies. 2/5
Great story, great action. Using skyhook during combat is awesome. One of the best FPS games i've played recently.
Gutes Spiel. Tolle Story mit überraschendem Ende.
Un FPS magnifico con una historia y desarrolo de personajes fantastica acorde con su saga un juego maravilloso

Juegaso de principio a fin, una historia y una jugabilidad impresionantes, es de los pocos juegos que en todo aspecto se noto que hicieron lo posible por que el juego fuera épico, si te gustan los shooters y las historias este es tu juego realmente una joya que ningun gamer deberia dejar pasar.
uno de esos juegos que te hace sentir que la vida vale la pena

Sempre enjoo rapido de jogos que não sejam casuais ou a história em que a história não me prenda magnificamente. Bioshock infinite tem uma história tão bem trabalhada ao lado de uma jogabilidade decente e um cenario lindo, que não consegui não me preender ao jogo como me preendo a um livro ao qual eu quero continuar lendo para saber o fim da história e o melhor, Bioshock Infinite não segue o padrão de final bosta como muitos jogos atuais tem feito, pelo contrario Bioshock possui um final magnifico. ALTAMENDO recomendado !!!
I enjoyed the story and atmopsphere most of all. The gameplay was pretty fun, but could probably use a bit more depth. Still, it met the expectation for a Bioshock game.
what a wonderful story and graphic are so sharp and kool

Where can I start to even give this game justice? This game is amazing.
awesome
8/10 great story

Après 2 brillants épisodes, nous quittons Rapture pour Columbia, cité dans les nuages. 
Sitôt embarqué dans l'aventure, vous serez bluffé devant la beauté des graphismes. La cité volante revêt des allures de paradis sur Terre (enfin pas tout à fait), et vous aurez du mal à la quitter. Car celà ne se limite pas à de beaux graphismes.
En effet, la bande son et les musiques parachèvent "l'univers Columbia" avec la même richesse que l'univers de Rapture, tout en évoluant par rapport aux deux premiers opus. Le changement de décor et d'ambiance est donc total, pour notre plus grand émerveillement.

Bien entendu, les choses vont très vite se gâter, et là aussi, vous ne serez pas en reste. Un scénario fouillé (quoique un peu trop dur à avaler par moment) et qui se tient, digne de la lignée des Bioshock, de nouveaux pouvoirs divers et variés, la relation Booker/Elizabeth et l'interaction avec les aérofrêts... De quoi vous ravir et d'en avoir pour toutes les stratégies sans essoufler le gameplay.

Un petit conseil : si vous en avez la possibilité, je vous encourage à jouer au DLC Burial at Sea (Episode I et II), ce DLC achève brillament la trilogie tout en faisant le lien avec Rapture. Il est cependant préférable d'avoir achevé Bioshock pour  apprécier toutes les subtilités du scénario ou pour vous éviter tout spoiler.

En résumé, un excellent titre qui ne laissera pas le joueur en reste, digne successeur des Bioshock (version Rapture). Un MUST HAVE.

epic game!!

The change from underwater to above the clouds was an interesting choice. The game also captured the effect of how choices change us entirely. It also provides us with a new waifu, minigun-wielding robot washingtons and lincolns, and drinks that let us throw fire and birds and shit.

Bioshock Infinite игра года (2013). Атмосфера в игре отличная, небесный город красив, а Элизебет по мимо того что няша, так она выполняет полезные функции: раздает патроны, аптечки, соли и деньги. Да и вообще персонаж получился очень живой, что очень редко в играх встречается.
Оценка игре 11/10. По эмоциям отбивает 3 раза. =)
I love the story in the game, also the visuals, but it lacks on the bioshock clasic mechanics.

The storyline of this game is so well written, coupled with amazing gameplay mechanics and beatiful graphics and surroundings makes for an awesome game I would can wholeheartedly recommend to anyone, definitely worth more than the price i paid for it at  75% discount (with the season pass included). For anyone who has played the previous Bioshock games, the Season Pass is a nice addition because it connects the game with the previous ones (if you manage to understand the plot, as it is very complicated)
